name: Ninjanura Moldy Pizza Hunter
description: The frog has long been tired of her boring life. All of his friends would rather enjoy their devices than talk to each other. The frog would love to be like a ninjaturtle, from which he gets the idea to go on a vengeance against modern technology. The only problem is that the frog doesn’t know how to fight but rather he eats the pizza he loves. He turns his weakness into a strength and eats a piece of moldy pizza that gives him the ability to shoot vomit. A vengeance against the machines can begin!
